short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Suggests items sold from Local businesses

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Localy aims to promote local businesses during the Covid-19 Pandemic. 
This chrome extension is meant to highlight and suggest companies that have the item you're about to check-out with on Amazon.  

For every item you have in your cart, Localy will suggest up to three businesses that have the product or one similar.
